LoginProfile.description: Contains the user name and password create date for a user.

properties.name: PasswordResetRequired
properties.description: Specifies whether the user is required to set a new password on next sign-in.

type.description: Specifies whether the user is required to set a new password on next sign-in.

Policy.description: Contains information about an attached policy.

properties.name: PolicyName
properties.description: The friendly name (not ARN) identifying the policy.

type.description: The friendly name (not ARN) identifying the policy.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Groups
properties.description: A list of group names to which you want to add the user.

type.description: A list of group names to which you want to add the user.

properties.name: LoginProfile
properties.description: Creates a password for the specified IAM user. A password allows an IAM user to access AWS services through the AWS Management Console.

type.description: Creates a password for the specified IAM user. A password allows an IAM user to access AWS services through the AWS Management Console.

properties.name: ManagedPolicyArns
properties.description: A list of Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the IAM managed policies that you want to attach to the role.

type.description: A list of Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the IAM managed policies that you want to attach to the role.

properties.name: Path
properties.description: The path to the user. For more information about paths, see IAM identifiers in the IAM User Guide. The ARN of the policy used to set the permissions boundary for the user.

type.description: The path to the user. For more information about paths, see IAM identifiers in the IAM User Guide. The ARN of the policy used to set the permissions boundary for the user.

properties.name: PermissionsBoundary
properties.description: The ARN of the policy that is used to set the permissions boundary for the user.

type.description: The ARN of the policy that is used to set the permissions boundary for the user.

properties.name: Policies
properties.description: Adds or updates an inline policy document that is embedded in the specified IAM role.

type.description: Adds or updates an inline policy document that is embedded in the specified IAM role.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A list of tags that are associated with the user. For more information about tagging, see Tagging IAM resources in the IAM User Guide.

type.description: A list of tags that are associated with the user. For more information about tagging, see Tagging IAM resources in the IAM User Guide.

properties.name: UserName
properties.description: The friendly name identifying the user.

type.description: The friendly name identifying the user.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the user. For more information about ARNs and how to use ARNs in policies, see IAM Identifiers in the IAM User Guide.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the user. For more information about ARNs and how to use ARNs in policies, see IAM Identifiers in the IAM User Guide.
